verses.roman:
ithi lāgi' āge kari tāra vivaraṇa
yāhā haite haya gaurera mahimā-kathana

synonyms: ithi lāgi'-for this; āge—first; kari—I shall do; tāra—of that; vivaraṇa—description; yāhā haite—from which; haya—there is; gaurera—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahimā—the glory; kathana—relating.
translation: Therefore I shall first delineate the position of Rādhā and Kṛṣṇa. From that the glory of Lord Caitanya will be known.
